massmessage-form-subject-help: Yɛ bu y'ani gu wae so sɛ yɛ yiyi krataafa a yɛ de bɛ kɔ sɛ adesuadeɛ.
massmessage-form-page-message-section: Krataafa no fa a yɛ de bɛkɔ sɛ nkratoɔ.
massmessage-form-page-message-section-he: Yiyi krataafa na dinkae hwɛ sɛ dea ne bɔberɛ teɛ na hwɛ ɛfa a ɛwɔ hɔ. Si yɛ bɛyi ɛfa bi a ɛbɛyɛ deɛ yɛ de bɛkɔ sɛ nkratoɔ no pɛ.
massmessage-form-page-subject-section: Krataafa no fa bi a yɛ de bɛ kɔ sɛ adesuadeɛ
massmessage-form-page-subject-section-he: Yiyi krataafa no na dinkae hwɛ ne bɔbrɛ na hwɛ ne fa a ɛwɔ hɔ no na twerɛ.ɛfa a y'ayiyi no pɛ n a yɛ de bɛkɔ adesuadeɛ.yɛyi nea ɛbɛta ho ne santen fofroɔ.
massmessage-page-subject-empty: ɛfa "$1" a y'ayiyi wɔ krataafa no mu "$2" a yɛ de bɛ Kɔ sɛ adsuadeɛ no nni nsɛfua biara
